name: Doki Doki Friday Night Funkin' Club Deluxe
name_original: Doki Doki Friday Night Funkin' Club Deluxe
description:
/!\ WARNING /!\

This mod is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Individuals suffering from anxiety or depression may not have a safe experience playing this.

This mod also features spoilers for the original Doki Doki Literature Club. It is highly recommended that you play the original game first: http://ddlc.moe

Welcome back to the Literature Club! Sing with the club members and experience the terror of rap battling in this new take on the critically-acclaimed psychological horror story.

Enter the #1 Psychological Horror Experience in a whole new way!

Boyfriend, Girlfriend, & Bowser Jr were chilling at GF's house on a rainy day, and they reluctantly decide to play on the Nintendo Switch. Girlfriend suggested that they play Doki Doki Literature Club Plus, but as soon as they inserted the game card, Daddy Dearest traps all three of them inside the game. Now they have to find a way out, by rap battling the Literature Club. Do you have what it takes to crack the code of the club and get a perfect ending?

There are some new features included in this grand overhaul return of the original DDFNFC Mod that came out 1 year ago.

Doki Doki FNF Club Deluxe includes:
- 30+ new songs!
- 3 Playable Characters with their own routes! (Boyfriend, Bowser Jr, & Monika)
- In-game achievements! There are 24 different achievements to earn!
- New sprite & background art by SANTIAGO GAMER FAN, Dusk, BlueSkies, & Spriter's Resource!
And so much more!

Meet the Literature Club!

Sayori - Sayori, the bright, happy, and positive one. As a daydreamer full of positive energy, Sayori's greatest passion is to deliver happiness to others. Although, there might be something going on behind the scenes...

Natsuki - Natsuki tries to act tough, but her cuteness can make it hard to take her too seriously! She might be willing to warm up to good listeners who can respect her love for songs, and cute things. It's almost like she's done rap battles before...

Yuri - Yuri, the quiet bookworm, reserves her passionate side for those who can more deeply understand her enigmatic mind. She seems a little bit nervous about rap battling...

Monika - Monika, the superstar President of the Literature Club, and one of the three playable characters, will keep you on track for a perfect ending. Monika is always there to give you a guiding hand, both in rap battling & gettin' freaky on a Friday Night!
